name: Face Party
description:
The most popular merge game is here
Let's take a challenge and see what is the maximum number that can be merged?
Combine to win rewards,Each merger may be accompanied by rewards.
Try to merge into the biggest face!
Easy play, try your best to merge the largest face!

How to play
-Use three same face to make one bigger number face
-Get rewards by merging!

This is challenging and helps keep your mind sharp!
Your goal is merged the largest face as you can
Enjoy this game and get more score!!!
